snippet.title: Dungeon! for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Dungeon! is a rogue-like RPG for 1 - 4 players.

Every player can choose one of four classes, which are:

Elf
Hero
Superhero
Wizard

The better the class, the more gold you have to get to win the game.


Nice game, but not as good as Dungeon Campaign if there is only 1 player playing this.

Highly recommended to play this with another player (or even 3 or 4)...the more players, the better!
